title: Public Holidays (Declaration) (No. 4) Notice, 2021
content:
20th August, 2021 Statutory Instruments 637
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
Statutory Instrument No. 73 of 2021
The Public Holidays Act
(Laws, Volume 15, Cap. 272)
The Public Holidays (Declaration) (No. 4) Notice, 2021
In exercise of the powers contained in section 3 of the Public
Holidays Act, the following Notice is issued:
1. This Notice may be cited as the Public Holidays (Declaration) Title
(No. 4) Notice, 2021.
2. It is declared that Tuesday, 24th August, 2021, shall be Declaration
observed as a public holiday in view of the swearing-in ceremony of public
holiday
of the President-elect and the Vice-President-elect to be held on
that day.
Edgar C. Lungu,
President
Lusaka
19th August, 2021
[co. 101/17/5]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
638 Statutory Instruments 20th August, 2021
